article.title: ITT Receives $317 Million Order for Counter Improvised Explosive Devices
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: ITT Corporation has been awarded $317 million to produce an additional 4,501 CREW 2.1 Vehicle Receiver Jammers, vehicle-mounted systems that prevent the detonation of improvised explosive devices. These systems will be used by the U.S. Marine Corps. The contract was awarded by the U.S. Naval Sea Systems Command.
